scripts.generate-php: npx openapi-generator-cli generate -g php-nextgen -o clients/urlr-php -i openapi.yaml -c openapi-generator/config-php.yaml
scripts.generate-javascript: npx openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-fetch -o clients/urlr-javascript -i openapi.yaml -c openapi-generator/config-javascript.yaml
scripts.generate-python: npx openapi-generator-cli generate -g python -o clients/urlr-python -i openapi.yaml -c openapi-generator/config-python.yaml
